Label.en: As you might know from the other stories, France had been through, and continued to feel the effects of, several important revolutions
Label.fr: Comme évoqué dans les autres histoires, la France a traversé son lot de révolutions
Label.es: As you might know from the other stories, France had been through, and continued to feel the effects of, several important revolutions
Label.zh: As you might know from the other stories, France had been through, and continued to feel the effects of, several important revolutions

Label.fr: Il y avait un esprit anti-aristocrates, anti-riches, anti-corporate, anti-bourgeois....

Label.en: Well... the industrial revolution was really the first time that mega-corporations began to come about
Label.fr: Eh bien la révolution industrielle c'était le début des mega-corporations
Label.es: Well... the industrial revolution was really the first time that mega-corporations began to come about
Label.zh: Well... the industrial revolution was really the first time that mega-corporations began to come about

Label.en: But France had just been through a revolution championing the rights of the little guy...
Label.fr: La France venait de traverser une révolution sur le thème des droits des petites gens...
Label.es: But France had just been through a revolution championing the rights of the little guy...
Label.zh: But France had just been through a revolution championing the rights of the little guy...

Label.en: So there was definitely some ideological conflict... which caused France to be a bit slower in adopting industrial methods
Label.fr: Les méthodes industrielles, le commerce et l'enrichissement rapide n'étaient pas en odeur de sainteté
Label.es: So there was definitely some ideological conflict... which caused France to be a bit slower in adopting industrial methods
Label.zh: So there was definitely some ideological conflict... which caused France to be a bit slower in adopting industrial methods
